ideas.title: Yarra River Taxi Troubles
ideas.premise: A frustrated businessman trying to hail a water taxi on the Yarra is surrounded by floating coffee cups and discarded trams.
ideas.why_funny: Highlights Melbourne's famous river'sâ€¦less glamorous aspects with exaggerated imagery.

ideas.title: Aussie Rules Roadworks
ideas.premise: Road workers paint road lines like an AFL field, complete with centre square and 50-meter arc.
ideas.why_funny: Combines Melbourne's roadworks woes with its passion for Aussie Rules football.

ideas.title: Unexpected Exhibition
ideas.premise: A NGV curator argues with a bewildered tradesman who's accidentally installed a ceiling fan as 'performance art'.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at the pretentiousness sometimes associated with modern art in a Melburnian context.

ideas.title: Four Seasons Forecast
ideas.premise: A confused meteorologist presents four weather maps on the same screen, representing all 'seasons' in one day.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable frustration with Melbourne's notoriously unpredictable weather conditions.

ideas.title: Laneway Latte Lines
ideas.premise: Massive queues form in a tiny laneway not for a gig, but for the newest, trendiest, most obscure coffee bean blend.
ideas.why_funny: Satirises Melbourne's obsession with coffee and its hidden laneway culture in an exaggerated way.
